name: Pipelinks
description:
Welcome to Pipelinks! In this 2D tile-based puzzle game, you'll take on the role of the Pipelinks, a group of quirky characters who love nothing more than to connect with each other to reach their goal.

The game features dozens of levels, each with a unique layout that will challenge your puzzle-solving skills. Your goal is to connect the Pipelinks and get them to where they need to go!

But be careful! You'll need to think ahead and plan your moves carefully. You'll need to navigate obstacles like blocks and rockets that will test your spatial awareness.

As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter new challenges and obstacles that will keep you on your toes. But don't worry, the Pipelinks are always ready to lend a helping hand! You can call on their special abilities to help you solve even the trickiest puzzles.

With its colorful graphics, catchy soundtrack, and addictive gameplay, Pipelinks is sure to keep you entertained for hours on end. So what are you waiting for? Connect those Pipelinks and reach the goal!
